headline: Devon Energy (DVN): Among Billionaire Ken Griffin’s Midcap Stock Picks with Huge Upside Potential
summary: We recently published a list of Billionaire Ken Griffin’s 10 Midcap Stock Picks with Huge Upside Potential.
